high_descs: walk to the end of the room ahead, and then turn right to face the desk
grab the clear bowl off of the table
turn right and walk to the near end of the room, then turn left to walk over to the right side of the desk on the left
turn the lamp on on the right side of the desk
anns.task_desc: turn on a lamp while holding a bowl

high_descs: Go straight to the desk chair, then turn right to face the desk.
Take the bowl from the desk.
Turn right, go straight, when you reach the middle of the bed turn left, go straight to the wall, turn left to face the desk.
Turn the lamp on the desk on.
anns.task_desc: Inspect a bowl near a lit lamp.

high_descs: Walk forward and turn right to face the desk closest to the window.
Pick up the bowl from the desk.
Turn right and walk to the other desk.
anns.task_desc: Look at the bowl by the lamp light.
